Class MapData

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapData

  • public class MapData
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the database data provided as map.
    Author:
    David Eriksson, Fredrik Lindahl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapData(org.json.JSONObject mapdata, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new map from provided data and name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets all of the coins on the map.

      Gets the list of edges.

      Removes a coin which is located on the map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapData

        public MapData(org.json.JSONObject mapdata,
               java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new map from provided data and name.
        Parameters:
        mapdata - The database mapdata as a JSONObject.
        name - The name which the map has.

    • Method Detail

      • getCoins

        public Coordinate[] getCoins()
        Gets all of the coins on the map.
        Returns:
        A list of all coins which are located on the map.

      • getEdgeList

        public Edge[] getEdgeList()
        Gets the list of edges.
        Returns:
        A list of edges.

      • removeCoin

        public void removeCoin(int id)
        Removes a coin which is located on the map.
        Parameters:
        id - The specified id of the coin which is to be removed.

      • toJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON(boolean pacman)
        Converts the map into a JSON format.
        Parameters:
        pacman - Boolean if the player is pacman, due to ghosts not being able to see coins.
        Returns:
        A JSONObject containing all details of the map.
